name: Wanterr
description: Create gigs and get reverse bid on it
overview:
Wanterr is a marketplace for gigs that are posted online and reverse bidded. Essentially, you can buy or get services for a steal. So anyone can create a gig ( Ningo ) for small service or something you wish to buy, on this site. Sellers and service providers can bid on the user gigs. Wanterr is a free service.

The Ningo created can be anything from asking for Hybrid bike or asking for a deal on a dinner for a couple.

The idea behind the Wanterr looks very interesting and definitely something you should try once to see how low the price of your buy can come down. Moreover you are not obligated buy the Ningo you have asked for.
